LanguageData.EarlGreyTea.label: Earl Grey Tea - hot.
LanguageData.EarlGreyTea.description: A replicated cup of Earl Grey tea, hot.
LanguageData.EmergencyRations.label: packaged emergency rations
LanguageData.EmergencyRations.description: Expensive to replicate, but nourishing and nutritious. These rations are a blend of multiple dehydrated vegetable bases, wheat, and dehydrated fruits mashed together into an entirely unappetizing meal cake.
LanguageData.PhasePack.label: charged phase pack
LanguageData.PhasePack.description: Designed to recharge pulse cannon turrets.
